defMet: Default meteorite. In a collision, it destroys the ship.
iceMet: Ice meteorite. Slows down the player upon collision.
smallMet: Small ruby ​​meteorite. When colliding with a player, it destroys the ship.
starship: A ship controlled by the player.
ammo: Ammunition. Replenishes the number of cartridges.
blackHole: Black hole. Attracts objects to itself.
